硜字的基本解释

硜
kēng
见“硁”。

硜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kēng］
［《廣韻》口莖切，平耕，溪。］
亦作“1”。“硁1”的繁体字。“踁2”的被通假字。
(1)刚劲有力的击石声。
(2)见“硜硜”、“硜鄙”。
(3)见“硜硜”。
(4)坚确貌；坚定貌。
(5)见“硜硜”。
[②]［qìng］
［《集韻》詰定切，去徑，溪。］
“硁2”的繁体字。“磬1”的古字。

硜字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页830第14
【廣韻】口莖切【集韻】丘耕切【韻會】【正韻】丘庚切，?音鏗。石聲。【史記·樂書】石聲硜硜以立別。【註】硜聲果勁。　又【廣韻】硜硜，小人貌。【論語】硜硜然小人哉。　又通作踁。【晉書·范弘之傳】雖有踁踁之稱，而非大雅之致。【音義】踁當作硜。　亦作䃘。【韓愈詩】焉能守䃘䃘。　又【集韻】磬古作硜。註詳十一畫。

Shan
kēng
See "硁".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kēng］
["Guangyun" Cut the mouth and stem, plow, and stream. ]
Also called "1". Traditional characters for "硁1". "踁2" was passed falsely.
(1) Vigorous and powerful sound of hitting rocks.
(2) See "硁硁" and "硁di".
(3) See "硁硁".
(4) Firm appearance; firm appearance.
(5) See "硁硁".
[②]［qìng］
["Jiyun" cross-cutting, go to the path, the stream. ]
Traditional characters for "硁2". The ancient character of "Qing 1".
Shan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　硁; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 830 14
[Guang Yun] Mouth Stem Cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Gengqi [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Qiu Gengqi,? Yin Keng. Stone sound. 【Historical Records·Book of Music】Stone sound 硁硁 stand apart. [Note] The sound is fruitful.　[Guangyun] 硁硁, a small person. [The Analects] 硁硁然塁 Ran the villain.　Tong again. [Book of Jin·Fan Hong's Biography] Although it is known as squatting, it is not elegant. [Sound and Meaning] Take it as a stone.　 also as a tenant. [Han Yu Poems] Yan Neng Shou Dian.　[Jiyun] Ching of ancient works. Note detailed eleven paintings.
